name: Robot Arena: Throwing War
description:
Robot Arena: Throwing War is a 3v3 multiplayer game where you play as a robot and have to defeat the enemy team by throwing balls into their energy cell. The team that makes the enemy energy cell runs out of hp first wins!

Game Designer: https://lilshopa.itch.io

Game Designer: https://zalvin.itch.io

Programmer: https://leniton.itch.io/

3D Artist: https://alexandre-sampaio.itch.io/
